issue.title: Gas detection fails near wall (Urban Practice 1)

content.raw:
I could not reproduce this by running along the walls in the following room:
![Screenshot from 2020-01-17 10-21-00.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8ze6Mjd/images/3785071520-Screenshot_from_2020-01-17_10-21-00.png)

I ended up moving my robot to just outside of this room by following your general location and using this command:
`ign service -s /world/urban_circuit_practice_01/set_pose --reqtype ignition.msgs.Pose --reptype ignition.msgs.Boolean --timeout 300 --req 'name: "alpha", position { x: -95.166 y: -1.71 z: 5 }, orientation { x: 0 y: 0 z: 0 w: 1 }'`
